name: Ranger
description: The ranger is someone—a farmer, a hunter, or maybe a lumberjack—who lives and works on the edge of civilization and has acquired a deep knowledge of nature and survival. They may have learned to hunt or track prey, tame beasts, or construct traps as a result of living in the wilderness.
backstoryPrompts: Have you always lived in the wild, or did you move there
Do you see nature as nurturing or threatening -- or both?
How did you meet your animal companion?
What made you leave your previous life and start adventuring?

levelingBonuses.1: gain +2 to {{attr.NST}} and {{attr.DEX}}, and proficiency in {{skills.survival}}
